title: 打不开了
txt_content:
求各位大神帮忙看看这是咋了用的HMCL启动器
[17:41:35][main/INFO] *** Hello Minecraft! Launcher 2.3.5.4 ***
[17:41:36][main/INFO] Initialized settings.
[17:41:37][UpdateChecker/WARN] Failed to get update url.

replies.txt_content: 启动器更新的时候失败了，按理说不会影响游戏运行吧
